text: @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden Onondaga County/Syracuse Ny will now test anyone, sick or not, for coronavirus: Just bring ID.     I’m not sure what you and the bunch of you lying Democrats are talking about but it’s already going on.   Wake up and get out of bed
